keel.Algorithms.Preprocess.Missing_Values.EM

Class Gcvfctn

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Preprocess.Missing_Values.EM.Gcvfctn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UnivariateFunction

    public class Gcvfctn
extends java.lang.Object
implements UnivariateFunction
    Implements the GCV function. In this version, the regularization parameter is implemented as the lower and upper bounds of the optimization process
    Author:
    Julian Luengo Martin

    • Constructor Detail

      • Gcvfctn

        public Gcvfctn(double[] _d,
               double[] _fc2,
               double _trS0,
               int _dof0)
        Copy constructor
        Parameters:
        _d - the original column vector of eigenvalues
        _fc2 - the original row sum of squared Fourier coefficients
        _trS0 - the new Frobenius norm of generic part of residual matrix
        _dof0 - degrees of freedom in estimate of residual covariance matrix when regularization parameter is set to zero
